content:
The new Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 builds on top of the already great Gen 9 model, to bring some meaningful upgrades to the table. There’s a lot to like about the new refreshed ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 notebook and we think it deserves a spot in our collection of the best business

description: Let's take a look at the Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 vs MacBook Air comparison to find out which one's better.
